name: ADARSHA CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: Adarsh Charitable Trust provides training to build scalable, for-profit vocational training initiatives. Its mandate is also to enable support systems such as quality assurance, information systems and train the trainer academies either directly or through partnerships. Adarsha Charitable Trust  acts as a catalyst in skill development by providing funding to enterprises, companies and organisations that provide skill training. It will also develop appropriate models to enhance, support and coordinate private sector initiatives. The differentiated focus for the 21 sectors under Adarsha Charitable Trustâ€™s purview and its understanding of their viability will make every sector attractive to private investment.
